MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 area of Hawick. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:51pm. Our engineers are currently onsite near the Millpath substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:30pm on Sunday, 28 March 2021
